Review Title: A hidden gem in the mountain area
Review Text: A hidden gem in then mountain area where you can thoroughly enjoy the tranquility. We loved our room of chic design and with a terrace overlooking a piece of grassland.  Room is spotless cleaned.  Comfy bedding and good shower.  We had a dinner in the Michelin restaurant which one shouldn't miss.  Seamless check-in with a sparking wine (in fact any drinks you like) as a welcome drink.  The management is very attentive and caring.  It was my birthday the night we stayed in Terra.  I received a piece of birthday cake next day at breakfast time.  What a surprise (as I didn't mention anything when making reservation)!  Thank you Terra for making my stay an unforgettable one!

Review Text: This beautiful property is small and fairly remote. It is fairly new and modern but very much with a mountain theme. The dinners are amazing (Michelin 2*) whether you have the Terra Experience or the regular menu. The staff is extremely welcoming and helpful. The spa is small but very quiet and comfortable. Good hiking trails are nearby, with several rifugios. The views are great from the restaurant and the large decks off the rooms.

Review Text: Unbelievable food (well worth its 2 michelin stars), stunning location, beautiful rooms, we loved it!!

Imagine being close to heaven: Sarentino , 1700 meters more or less, the journey to get there is already worth the experience. Reached through a series of hairpin bends you arrive at ‘Terra’ not surprisingly called “The magic place”.... Wonderful location , Relais Chateau with completely eco-sustainable rooms and spa and a restaurant that makes the search for the products of the surrounding environment its workhorse. And we want to talk about his kitchen: 2 Michelin stars and recently deserved green star. Exciting tasting itinerary: a ‘land experience’ that remains etched in the memories of the diner.... The whole gastronomic journey is staggering for research, respect, knowledge, hazards, play.... And Some courses deserve a special mention: mushroom taco, ravioli, veal and wild strawberry dessert symbol of a growing proposal! Earth has everything it takes to be called EXCELLENCE! Here you make peace with yourself and feel pampered! Thank you.

Review Text: Fantastic food (dinner & breakfast) amazing wine at affordable price! Staff is very lovely you feel very welcome. Nice rooms, blinded curtains would have been nice though. Amazing spa!

If you have never experienced excellence in catering, this is the place.
It is not a simple dinner, it is a real culinary experience, a guided ups and downs of flavors with the experience of the chef and the room managers who know how to guide you on this journey in an excellent way.

Review Text: everything perfect, a place away from everything where you can live a real experience. I definitely recommend it

I returned to Terra for the second time, with the fear, as often happens, that something could disappoint me and break the beauty of the memory. However it didn't happen, Terra remains a magical place as the name suggests, where everything lives up to expectations. The welcome was wonderful, warm and informal, the cuisine was sublime and the combinations were perfect, the waiters were fantastic. I don't know what else to say other than we'll be back. PS look at the nice offers on the site, sometimes dreams are more attainable than you think. ...

Review Title: ✨💫Hidden Gem 💫✨in South Tyrol with a unique culinary experience, excellent service and a top location.
Review Text: The Terra lives up to its name! A magical place where you can indulge in culinary delights of the highest standard. The exceptionally friendly service, the great location and the wellness area are also worth mentioning.

Review Title: An amazing place in the Dolomites
Review Text: The Terra - The Magic Place, is indeed magical. If you are looking for the perfect escape/indulgence, this is the place. First, you drive on a small road that climbs through the amazing alpine landscape; when you reach to Terra, you are at the top of the mountain. The place only contains a small number of rooms, which means you have all the privacy you want to look out at the outstanding mountain view of the Dolomites and stars at night. Then, of course, is dinner in the two stars Michelin restaurant – for three hours you will have one of the most unforgettable meals. The local wine selections that accompany the dishes are incredible. The next morning you must take the 3 hour hike to Omini di pietra – the Stone Men site – another magical place with stones likely from medieval period that provides a 360 degree panorama of the Dolomitic mountain peaks in South Tyrol.  The combination of the secluded location, the restaurant, the wine, and the breathtaking panorama view of the Dolomites is memorable. We look forward to coming back!

Review Title: It really is...... The Magic Place!
Review Text:
A dream that we have realized... a magical place that can be reached by climbing from Sarentino to the end of the road. The excitement begins when you get out of the car. Kindness and friendliness above all. The structure is very beautiful with a dozen rooms, ours with a large window overlooking the forest, still covered in snow.
Absolutely nothing is missing.... The wellness area is small but beautiful and welcoming, adequate for the number of guests.
But let's get to the top... dinner. A long and delicious tasting menu, where every single dish deserved the attention of multiple senses... from sight... to aromas... to taste. All accompanied by an excellent wine tasting proposed by Mrs. Gisela.
Our first experience in a ** star hotel and we were able to understand and appreciate the research, the study, the work that brings incredible dishes to the table!
Much attention also for my celiac wife.
The gourmet breakfast is also excellent with dishes and ingredients of the highest quality.
A big thank you also to all the staff, very professional and kind who made us feel truly pampered.
How can you not return to such a magical place? Until we meet again......

Sleep Quality: 5
Review Text: It was just as fantastic as the first visit! Nowhere else have we eaten and been pampered so first-class. If anything has changed in the past few years, it has only been for the better!

Wonderful structure nestled in the mountains. From the welcome to the services offered, everything is taken care of to make you feel at home but at the same time pampered and spoiled.
The rooms are new, elegant, clean and with that touch of personality that makes the atmosphere warm and never aseptic.
You can also use the spa area which is truly a gem. The hydromassage tub overlooking a wonderful landscape makes everything more magical, the saunas and relaxation area really gave me an afternoon of comfort away from the commitments and stress of the week.
The welcome and care that the hosts put into managing and taking care of the guests' stay is impeccable and truly rare.
Not just a stay but a real cuddle

The road to reach it doesn't inspire you and you wonder if it's really the gift you wanted to celebrate your birthday. Then you get to the top and are greeted by  smiling, friendly people. A structure immersed in the woods. Everything inside is clean and new, recently renovated and still smells of wood
The room is large with large windows overlooking the woods and you are immediately pervaded by a feeling of calm and serenity. The wellness center is a gem and the hydromassage tub is its centerpiece: you can enjoy a spectacular view of the Dolomites while you are immersed in the warmth of the water illuminated by chromatic lamps. Everything is truly taken care of down to the smallest detail - Gisela and Heinrich Schneider, the owners, are people dedicated to their business and you can see and feel that they put their soul into it. They take care of everything personally: she ranges from reception to restaurant service and is an expert sommelier, her brother is an excellent, very creative chef who creates delicious starred dishes. Nice to know that they have lived in this enchanting place since their childhood and that with the relais they wanted to make their mother's dream come true

What else to add? An unforgettable experience
